AEH Construction provides a number of Exterior Services. We like to colaborate with each client sharing thoughts and ideas to help establish project vision.

Exterior

Painting / Presure Washing

Changing the appearance of your home is always exciting. We offer exterior painting and presure washing. The application of other products like waterbase paint, oil-base paint, stains and varnish.

Siding

Whether it be a home, shed, barn, or garage. We want to help. With so many styles and Choosing the perfect siding can be difficult. Let us help you with your dicision. We provide you with siding repair, tear down exsisting siding and put up new.

Decks

We love building decks and patios. At AEH Construction we are familiar with many different styles and materials used for deck building. If you are using a wood material for the decking. We offer application of stains water sealers and paints.

Landscape/Design

For the love of being outside and enjoying nice weather. Landscaping is always a company favorite. With a little creative vision. We begin with the design of each yard and flower bed. Using the different species of grass seed or turf and several different species of plants, shrubs, flowers, trees. We construct retaining walls as well, along with walkways and steps.

Custom Fencing

Building a fence is a great way to beautify and add character to your home. Not only does it look good but it also is an excellent way to add protection for you, your home, and your family. We offer custom fence design and application.

Gardens/Raised Beds

Gardening is definatly an outdoor favorite for many people. We offer garden landscape and design. With many different fencing, ground coverage, water sprinklers, raised beds or traditional gardens etc.

Fire Pits

Enjoy being outside with a new firepit area. custom design and built to your satisfaction. Using many types of stone for the pit and standing area. Also custom seating a lighting. If you want it we will make it.

Call or Email for a free Estimate.

Closed on weekends and holidays, but feel free to leave a message and we will get back to you ASAP!
